subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mika Miyazato of Japan held the lead at the Evian Championship with Lydia Ko a stroke behind. The tournament was shortened to 54 holes after rain left the greens soggy.
snippet: Mika Miyazato of Japan held the lead at the Evian Championship with Lydia Ko a stroke behind. The tournament was shortened to 54 holes after rain left the greens soggy.
